title: Embellished inline modern serif on Southern Comfort label
content:
hmm, what could this classic font be...

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [D963~Southern-Comfort-Label-Posters.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150324004409/http:/typophile.com/files/D963~Southern-Comfort-Label-Posters.jpg) | 61.2 KB |
author: lizthiem

comments.content: This was most likely hand lettered as most liquor labels are. If you like this embellished inline style you might like [Honduras](http://web.archive.org/web/20150324004409/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/red_rooster/honduras/), [Bertie](http://web.archive.org/web/20150324004409/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/bertie_std_plain/), and [Venezuela](http://web.archive.org/web/20150324004409/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/red_rooster/venezuela/).
